name: .WER File Extension
summary: Learn about .WER files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Error report generated by Windows Error Reporting (WER); captures software crash data and helps users provide crash information when reporting errors; gathers information for both operating system application crashes.

content: Windows Error Reporting is part of Microsoft Winqual services, which provide quality control for software and hardware vendors. Microsoft Winqual services can be accessed online through a Web browser.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
